Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute at 92nd/Exchange
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 93rd, South Chicago, Commercial, 92nd, then resume their normal route due to street blockage near 92nd/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 93rd, South Chicago, Commercial, 92nd, then resume their normal route due to street blockage near 92nd/Exchange.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier signal problem near Wilson. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier signal problem near Wilson.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

These may include:

#36 Broadway

#151 Sheridan

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
